channel.title: Hello-World on Lee Turner
channel.description: Recent content in Hello-World on Lee Turner

item.title: Hello World.... erm again
item.description: Well, what can I say? It has been nearly a year to the day that I posted my original Hello World post and I think it is fair to say that there hasn’t been a great deal of activity since. That isn’t to say that it hasn’t been an extremely busy 2018. I just completely failed to write about any of it which is a shame. 2018 was filled with some pretty cool stuff:

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Well, it has been quite a while since I’ve had a personal site up and running but given I am back in the dev world full-time, now seemed like a good time to kick one off again. At the moment I have no idea where this site is going to go but at the very least it will be a place for me to document what I am working on and the things I am playing around with - more for my reference than anything else but hopefully there might be some use for others as well.
